Package ec.app.experiments.GeneralandFitness

Class ColorHistogram

java.lang.Object
ec.app.experiments.GeneralandFitness.ColorHistogram
public class ColorHistogram extends Object
This class is used both to store color histogram information and compare its own values to that of other color histograms. Adaptations by Michael Gircys, 2017-06-08 Precomputed and stored bin colour similarity, instead of thousands of times across generations.
Author:
Steve Bergen

    • colorDS

      public double colorDS(ColorHistogram hist)

      Returns:
      Color distance
